description:
This additional content includes:

- "F Summer Hat" Palico layered armor piece 
- “F Summer Float” Palico layered armor piece

Get your Palico ready for the beach with this adorable summer outfit!

Dress up your buddy with this special layered armor!

- Palico layered armor can be used in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Buddy Board.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "F Summer" Palico layered armor set
